A '''copper chestplate''' is a variant of [[chestplate]] crafted from [[copper ingot]]s. It is the sixth-highest [[tier]] of chestplate, having higher armor points and durability than a [[leather tunic]].

== Obtaining ==

=== Mob loot ===
[[Zombie]]s, [[husk]]s, [[skeleton]]s, [[stray]]s, and [[bogged]] have a small chance to spawn [[Geared mobs|wearing armor]], which may include a copper chestplate. There is a 8.5% chance (9.5% with [[Looting]] I, 10.5% with Looting II and 11.5% with Looting III) for the mob to drop the chestplate they're wearing upon death. The dropped chestplate is usually badly damaged, and may be [[enchanted]] with enchantment levels 5-19.

== Usage ==
When worn, a copper chestplate provides {{armor|4}} [[armor points]].

=== Repairing ===
Two damaged copper chestplates can be combined through [[crafting]] or using the [[grindstone]]. The durability of the used copper chestplates are added together, plus an extra 5% durability. Both the crafting table and grindstone methods do not keep the enchantments of either chestplate.

{{Crafting|Damaged Copper Chestplate|Damaged Copper Chestplate

==== Unit repair ====
{{Repairing
| head=1
| Damaged Copper Chestplate
| Damaged Copper Chestplate; Copper Ingot
| Copper Chestplate
| tail=1
|description=
|showdescription=1
}}

A copper chestplate can also be repaired in an [[anvil]] by adding [[copper ingot]]s, with each ingot restoring 25% the copper chestplates' maximum durability, rounded down. Two copper chestplates of the same tier can also be combined in an anvil. Both methods using the anvil preserves a copper chestplate's [[enchantment]]s.

=== Armor trimming ===
It is possible to upgrade armor with trims. This requires a [[smithing template]], a copper chestplate, and an ingot or crystal ([[iron ingot]], [[copper ingot]], [[gold ingot]], [[netherite ingot]], [[emerald]], [[redstone dust]], [[lapis lazuli]], [[amethyst shard]], [[nether quartz]], [[diamond]], or [[resin brick]]).

These trims have no effect on the gameplay or strength of the armor.

|ingredients=Any Armor Trim +<br>Copper Chestplate +<br>Any Ingot/Crystal
